name: B.I. Group
overview: The Business Intelligence Group is a professional human resource consulting firm, having rich professional experience in the area of Human Resource consulting services. We have a team of highly qualified and experienced executives who are servicing diverse industries including Information Technology, Telecommunication, Automobiles, Pharmaceuticals, Engineering, FMCG and Food & Beverages. We realize that recruitment process has undergone tremendous change as job seekers are more informed now. This has made it imperative to redefine our service model and value proposition to deliver quality results in an ever-evolving business world.
